titleInfo.title: Brought to the First District Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the First District Police Prison -- JACK, a black, 5 feet 3 inches high, 27 years oldSays he belongs to MrHenry Jackson, of BaltimoreThe owner will please comply with the law respecting himJONATHAN WORRALL,WardenNewOrleans, October 18, 1853o18 1aw3w

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866
